unnormalised: Did you know that Sachin Tendulkar scored 100 centuries in international cricket? He has 51 in Tests and 49 in ODIs. Also, India won the 1983 Cricket World Cup with a score of 183/10, defeating West Indies who had 140 all out. In the 2011 World Cup final, India scored 277/4, chasing Sri Lanka's 274/6. Virat Kohli currently has 76 international centuries.
normalised: Did you know that Sachin Tendulkar scored one hundred centuries in international cricket? He has fifty one in Tests and forty nine in O-D-Is. Also, India won the one thousand nine hundred and eighty three Cricket World Cup with a score of one hundred and eighty three divided by ten, defeating West Indies who had one hundred and forty all out. In the two thousand and eleven World Cup final, India scored two hundred and seventy seven divided by four, chasing Sri Lanka's two hundred and seventy four divided by six. Virat Kohli currently has seventy six international centuries.
